ACTION REPORT

October 17, 2000

Items being done this month:

  1. Roof repairs are being done as needed. The start date for the re-roofing is the end of November/early December.

  2. Cleaning of the entry tiles will be completed by the end of the month.

  3. Reflex is working with the roofer starting the penetrations. This is the first step the others will follow soon. Should be done in about a month.

    4.

Items to be done next month:

  1. Tile bids are also hard to get but we are still working on it.

  2. Bids will be coming in regarding the final trimming and removal of the Palm trees that touch the buildings.

    3.

Items being done by maintenance:

  1. We are sorting and organizing the storage areas. Will be finished by the end of the month.

  2. The garbage areas and dumpsters are being cleaned, one at a time.

Items completed last month:

  1. We still need another nite-staff person.

  2. Fountains have been rebuilt.

  3. Carpets have been cleaned.
